name.baseName: Coagulated gum, whole latex, concentrated latex, gross tea, silkworm cocoon (roasted cocoon) ; Biomass fuel ; Hot blast stove prosscess ; All sizes; NESPS2
凝标胶、全乳胶、浓缩乳胶、毛茶、蚕茧（烤茧） ; 生物质燃料 ; 热风炉工艺 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideis/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideis/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该工艺用于生产来自凝胶、全乳胶、浓缩乳胶、毛茶、蚕茧（包括烤茧）等多种来源的生物质燃料。生产出的生物质燃料旨在用于所有规模的热风炉工艺。这些工艺在纺织和食品工业等需要热量作为生产必要部分的产业中有应用。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码05,四级代码0514文件，在完整版文件中第3413页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isBag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99.6
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是袋式除尘，其效率为99.6，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设施年运行时间（小时）/热风炉年运行时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为颗粒物
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isCentrifugal water film，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management87

Pollutant indicator sulfur dioxide end-of-pipe technology is /, its efficiency is 0. The original document describes the pollutant category as exhaust gas, the pollutant indicator sulfur dioxide, here to match it to the LCAflow library face to face the most compatible flow, pollutant indicator note for sulfur dioxide, pollution coefficient note for sulfur dioxide production coefficient in the form of sulfur content (S%), where Sulfur content (S%) is the sulfur content of the fuel, expressed as a mass percentage. For example, if the sulphur content (S%) of the fuel is 3%, then S=3 The production coefficient described in the original article is 17 S. Please modify the corresponding emissions according to the notes after self-calculation.

污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为二氧化硫，产污系数备注为二氧化硫产污系数以含硫量(S%)形式表示，其中含硫量(S%)是指燃料硫分含量，以质量百分数表示。例如燃料中含硫量(S%)为3%，则S=3原文描述的产污系数为 17S。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。
